snippet: The state Senate will not pass a bill in its current form that would prevent lawsuits against someone who refuses, for religious reasons, to provide services to gays and lesbians, the chamber’s president said Friday.
lead_paragraph: The state Senate will not pass a bill in its current form that would prevent lawsuits against someone who refuses, for religious reasons, to provide services to gays and lesbians, the chamber’s president said Friday.

headline.main: Kansas: Senate President Objects to Bill on Services for Gay Couples
headline.print_headline: Kansas: Senate President Objects To Bill On Services For Gay Couples
